full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### EP168-232281 Damkeeper Labour for French River Dams

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit a proposal for the provision of In-Service Support at the French River Dams in Canada.

**Contract Details:**

* **Tender Reference:** WS4233827324-Doc4273537770
* **Tender Opening Date:** Friday, December 15, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** January 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** December 31, 2026

**Scope of Work:**

The successful contractor will provide In-Service Support, which encompasses both damkeeper labor and various maintenance and repair services for the French River dams. Work will be carried out on an "as and when requested" basis, using the Task Authorization Process outlined in the contract.

**Location:**

The French River dams are situated on the headwaters of the French River near the Dokis First Nation, at the southwest corner of Lake Nippissing.

**Services Required:**

The successful contractor will be responsible for providing a range of services, including:

* Damkeeper labor
* Maintenance and repair services for the dams and their associated structures and equipment

**Contact Information:**

For further information or to obtain the tender documents, please contact:

* Pierre Lavigne (SPAC/PSPC) at pierre.lavigne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Tender Documents:**

The tender documents can be accessed at https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18004416?extsite=MTgwMDQ0MTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Note:**

The tender has expired, and interested contractors are advised to refer to the tender documents for further details.  The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) reserves the right to revise or modify the tender terms and conditions.  All proposals must be submitted in accordance with the specified requirements.  Late proposals will not be accepted.  The successful contractor will be announced on the Government of Canada's tendering website.
